wikipedia_page.main: Stuart Brown (born 29 June 1972) is a British sidecarcross rider. Internationally, his greatest success has been two third place overall finishes (FIM Bronze Medal), achieved in the 2014 Sidecarcross World Championship and 2016 Sidecarcross World Championship. Domestically he has won a record fourteen national British Sidecarcross Championships.
